====1936====
In 1936, Hydra leaders [[Heinrich Zemo (Earth-TRN640)|Baron Zemo]], [[Elisa Sinclair (Earth-616)|Elisa Sinclair]], Dr. Sebastian Fenhoff and Kraken soon discussed their involvement along [[Nazi Germany (Earth-TRN640)|Nazi Germany]] and the [[Axis (WWII) (Earth-TRN640)|Axis]], seeing [[Adolf Hitler (Earth-TRN640)|the Führer, Adolf Hitler]], as the one they were waiting for.

The plan was to infiltrate among the ranks of the Axis and install their own lieutenants, influencing the formal partnership with the Third Reich. Elisa Sinclair's connection within the '''Thule Society''' were crucial for this plan. Hydra wished to benefit of the relics of the dark arts and the Lost Gods that Hitler was assembling.{{r|Captain America: Steve Rogers #8}}

=====1945=====
In 1945, the Red Skull eventually successfully took over Elisa Sinclair's [[Brotherhood of the Spear (Earth-TRN640)|Spear]], merging it with the Thule Society{{verify source}}<!-- that was valid at the time it was in Earth-616, where Red Skull was Thule --> into the modern Hydra, creating a definitive organization.{{r|Captain America: Steve Rogers #15|16}}
